name: 嬰幼兒敘說專題研究
description: 本課程目標在精進學生對嬰幼兒敘說發展歷程、研究及相關理論的瞭解，並培養學生評析和執行嬰幼兒敘說研究的能力。探討的主題包括敘說之定義和文類、嬰幼兒敘說能力發展、嬰幼兒敘說結構要素和結構模式、嬰幼兒敘說與閱讀能力、促進嬰幼兒敘說能力發展之因素、特殊嬰幼兒敘說發展、嬰幼兒敘說研究方法等。課程實施方式包括專書和期刊論文之講述、評析與討論、學生專題研究報告等。
goals: 精進學生對嬰幼兒敘說發展歷程、研究及相關理論的瞭解。
強化學生評析和執行嬰幼兒敘說研究的能力。
具備執行嬰幼兒敘說研究倫理。
syllabus:

Week 2            Narrative genre (1)                         

Week 3            Narrative genre (2)

Week 4            Narrative analysis: Method (1)

Week 5           Narrative analysis: Method (2)

Week 6            Approaches to narrative development (1): High point analysis

Week 7            Approaches to narrative development (2): Episodic analysis

Week 8            Approaches to narrative development (3): Stanza analysis

Week 9            Approaches to narrative development (4): Interpretive and sociocultural approach

Week 10          Narrative as scripts

Week 11          Social support for narrative abilities

Week 12          Cohesion and coherence/local and global structure

Week 13          Discussion of your project proposal

Week 14        Evaluation/Affect in narratives

Week 15          Cultural/linguistic differences

Week 16          Assessment  
Week 17        Narrative abilities of children with special needs

Week 18          Project presentation
